title: Bug 2120: MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)
OB: The files that were recently used do not appear in the File menu MRU (Most Recently Used) list.
EB: The MRU File List should persist between sessions, so that the recently used files are displayed in the File menu MRU list even after restarting the application.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application and relaunch it.
4. Check the File menu MRU list. The recently used files should still be displayed.
